title: Getting Ready For The Weekend
itunes:title: Getting Ready For The Weekend
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

Today we begin our three part series on weekends. We start with the importance of creating a weekend plan. This plan needs to be doable and realistic. It needs to be something you know you will successfully complete.

Part of creating this plan is visualizing! Think about what you'll eat, where you'll eat it, and who you are eating it with! Think about what you'll say and do when someone calls to ask you to go out. And think about how great you'll feel at the end of the weekend when you know you've banged it out of the park.

Listen in for some great tips for planning an amazing weekend.
